DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine repeat daily dos T0903131 ( INT131 ) Besylate 4 week low fast blood glucose patient Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study T0903131 ( INT131 ) Besylate Treat Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Clinical Diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus least 3 month prior enrollment Fasting Plasma Glucose 126 240 mg/dL HemoglobinA1c ( HbA1c ) 6.8 % 10.0 % Fasting Cpeptide > 0.8 ng/mL Treatment pharmacotherapy Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus within previous 6 week prior screen Prior treatment Thiazolidinedione , include Troglitazone , Rosiglitazone , pioglitazone BMI > 42 kg/m2 Presence diabetic complication require chronic therapy Presence history form hepatic disease Serum creatinine > 1.8 mg/dL History cardiac arrhythmia abnormal cardiac electrophysiology Any reason , Investigator 's judgment , would interfere ability subject comply requirement protocol
